title: Board of Code Standards
description: The BCSA provides technical code review and recommendations to the City Council and County Commission on matters involving the Building Code, building construction & remodeling, contractor licensing, dangerous building condemnation and demolition, and neighborhood code enforcement matters.
location: 730 N. Main

title: Wichita Airport Advisory Board
description: Provide advice and recommendations to the City Council and City Manager on matters of policy and strategic long-term development issues affecting municipally-owned and operated airports.
location: Airport Administration Office, 2173 Air Cargo Road, Wichita, KS 67209
